name: CoCredo
overview:
CoCredo is a market-leading company selling online company credit reports and related business information. We have direct feeds from Dun & Bradstreet, Companies House and other premium providers. We provide business information on over 170 million companies across 240 countries. Our Information is updated over 500,000 times per day and we have some excellent tracking mechanisms which provide proactive daily monitoring of changes in the information on record. CoCredo was started in 2001as part of Wyse Leasing, and became a stand-alone company in 2005. We also have a joint venture company, New Start Data, www.newstartdata.co.uk, that can provide information on all newly formed companies the day after the company is formed. Specialties

Business Information, Credit Reports, Company Searches, Direct Marketing Information, Company Profiling, International Reports, Risk evaluation, New Start Company Data, Consumer and Personal Searches, XML delivery, Companies House Documents., Portfolio Management
